Scene¶

Scene class.

  • Load assets.

  • Create world.

  • Create game objects, add to world.

Import modules¶

import { Scene } from '@phaserjs/phaser/scenes/Scene';

Define Scene class¶

class MyScene extends Scene {
    constructor() {
        super();

        // Load assets, or create world and game objects
    }
}

Events¶

  • On update

    Events.On(scene, 'update', function(delta, time) { }, context);

    • Each world fires 'update' event under scene’s 'update' event, and run world.update(delta, time) to invoke gameObject.update(delta, time) of all children.

  • On render

    Events.On(scene, 'render', function(renderResult) { }, context);

    • Each world prepare renderable game object list under scene’s 'render' event.
